description: Number of perfect simple undirected graphs on n nodes.
references: A. Brandstaedt, V. B. Le and J. P. Spinrad, Graph Classes: A Survey, SIAM Publications, 1999.
S. Hougardy, Classes of perfect graphs, Discr. Math. 306 (2006), 2529-2571.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Perfect Graph.
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: McKay link, giving more terms, supplied by _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 31 2003
a(12) added by _N. J. A. Sloane_ from the Hougardy paper, Oct 17 2006
